Difficulty Notes: Optimizing the number of resources obtained in X number of actions
Question: What is the maximum number of on-component essences the player could have after one more action. Assume all other players have passed. Output the answer as: Previous amount: <num>, New amount: <num>
Rationale: There are two life essences on Sacred Grove. The only way to add more is to have a creature card that can be turned. Player activate the second sacred grove power and turn both itself and nightingale to add one more life essence to sacred grove.
